title: Killer Games
description: Lily Carter is a Papadakis by marriage. Being related to the Greek mafia has many challenges, including being dumped by her FBI fiancé, Noah, when he finds out who she’s related to just before the wedding. To keep her safe she's put into witness protection but gets shot at. She returns to Detroit with her baby daughter to warn Noah and leave the county by way of Canada. She's kidnapped, shot at, and captured as prey by a madman hunter. Noah tries to protect her and his heart as they travel through Detroit's underbelly to keep them safe. Hard to do when there is a leak in the FBI office.
author: Nese Ellyson
